explains: n. 兽群，畜群；人群，民众
v. 驱赶（兽群），放牧；使（人）成群移动
wordGroup: a herd of 一群（牛、鹿等）
herd behavior 羊群行为；羊群效应；从众行为；群体恐慌行为
herd instinct [心]群居本能，群体心理

sentences.en: She pushed her way through a herd of lunchtime drinkers.
sentences.cn: 她从一群午餐时饮酒的人中间挤了过去。

sentences.en: A herd of goats was nibbling the turf around the base of the tower.
sentences.cn: 一群山羊正在啃着塔基周围的草皮。

sentences.en: With no natural predators on the island, the herd increased rapidly.
sentences.cn: 由于岛上没有天然食肉动物，牧群的数量迅速增加。
